grails.plugin.jodatime.util
[Groovy] Class DateTimeRange

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection
      java.util.AbstractList
          groovy.lang.ObjectRange
              grails.plugin.jodatime.util.DateTimeRange

class DateTimeRange
extends groovy.lang.ObjectRange

A `Range` implementation useful for representing date/time ranges with different increments.
